question.xref: DES s6, HC r208, HC r238, KYTS p56
question.text: You must not stop on these road markings because you may obstruct

explanation.text: These markings are found on the road outside schools. DO NOT stop (even to set down or pick up children) or park on them. The markings are to make sure that drivers, riders, children and other pedestrians have a clear view.

answer.text: children’s view of the crossing area
delivery vehicles’ access to the school
emergency vehicles’ access to the school
